topic.title: Uninstall the Database Service
topic.shortdesc: Process for uninstalling the Database Service from the HPE Helion Development Platform.

section.note: These services cannot be uninstalled from the Horizon console.
The uninstall instructions listed here do not delete existing database instances. Perform all backups as necessary and then delete your existing database instances as applicable.

ol.li: Log in to the Helion seed node.
Set environment variables.export TE_DATAFILE=/root/tripleo/ce_env.json export TRIPLEO_ROOT=/root/tripleo PATH=$PATH:$TRIPLEO_ROOT/tripleo-incubator/scripts/
Remove the service from Keystone.SERVICE_SHORT_NAME="database" SERVICE_ID=$(keystone service-list | grep $SERVICE_SHORT_NAME | cut -d" " -f2) keystone service-delete $SERVICE_ID

Find the ID's for the database images. The images will have the following names: dbaas-api_x.x.x.x, dbaas-conductor_x.x.x.x, dbaas-database_x.x.x.x, dbaas-guest_x.x.x.x, dbaas-messaging_x.x.x.x, dbaas-taskmanager_x.x.x.x glance image-list
Remove the images from Glance.glance image-delete <IMAGE_ID>
Remove the Heat templates from Swift.swift delete DBaaS-heat-templates
Find the DBaaS CSU images in the Sherpa cache.swift list sherpa-cache
Delete the items from the cache.swift delete sherpa-cache <ITEM>
Delete the Database as a Service (Trove) control plane:heat stack-delete trove
